EmailTemplate.description: Response to clients on receipt of their emails
EmailTemplate.name: Email Receipt
EmailTemplate.subject: Acknowledgement of Request
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear XXX
Thanks you for notifying us of your Salesforce technical request.
This email is to confirm that we have received your technical request. We will work on resolving your technical request and you will receive resolution within 24 working hours from receiving this email notification.
Your case number is:
Salesforce Internal Support
Phone: 011 895 6002
